postText: Anybody know a good grooming place in Houston?
Who else has a clingy cat!!
Just bought this sick spiked collar for my pitbull
Spotted a rare blue jay in my backyard today!
New aquarium setup! Check out my colorful fish.
Harvested the first tomatoes from my garden!
Finished reading an amazing novel. Any book recommendations?
Attended a fantastic concert last night!
Just booked a spontaneous trip to Bali!
Completed a challenging workout today. Feeling pumped!
